RenderViewExporterProxy.name: FbxExporter
RenderViewExporterProxy.Documentation: Exporter to export a single render view to an Fbx binary file. Only visible actors will be exporterd.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Name of the file to be written.

IntVectorProperty.name: Vertex Colors
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: A hint to use vertex coloring in the importing application.
